articles.title: Karlie Kloss says she’s 'tried' to talk politics with Ivanka Trump and Jared Kushner after protest
articles.description: After protestors stormed the U.S. Capitol, Karlie Kloss explained on Twitter that she has ''tried'' to discuss politics with her sister-in-law Ivanka Trump and brother-in-law Jared Kushner.

The US House is expected to vote on Trumps impeachment on Thursday.
